alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 24 at 10:47AM MST until February 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds gusting 50 to 60 mph expected, along with areas of reduced visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...Beartooth Foothills and Livingston Area. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong crosswinds along with areas of blowing and drifting snow will make travel difficult on Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber, and roads along the Beartooth Foothills. Expect locally reduced visibility to a mile or less where blowing snow occurs.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high-profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.
